content.content: Meet Your Delegate #16  Welcome to the (announcement for the) sixteenth episode of Meet Your Delegate, where MKR holders and the broader community get to know their delegates. For this episode, we will have delegate candidate @pvl presenting their platform and holding an AMA session. @Patrick_J will be hosting.  When 2022-07-07T15:00:00Z Google Calendar link  Where    Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Meeting ID: 896 9599 0453 Passcode: 838320

tags: Meet Your Delegate  Meet Your Delegate: Episode #16   Agenda   00:00: Introduction  00:44: pvl Delegate Platform  19:42: Questions   Video https://youtu.be/yIHFRJDA7cM  General Introduction  Patrick_J 00:00  Hello to everyone, and welcome to our Meet Your Delegate call with pvl. He is our latest candidate to have become a recognized delegate at MakerDAO. Today he will make a presentation of his Delegate Platform.   Delegate Introduction  pvl Delegate Platform 00:44  CLEAN MONEY >> CLEAN ENERGY1920×958 150 KB   oxman_for_maker1920×1200 67.3 KB   1920×957 196 KB   1920×950 149 KB   TOWARDS WEB3-NATIVEINTELLIGENCE1920×959 127 KB   1920×956 142 KB   DeCap+quadratic funding/Web3-native community tools1920×963 200 KB   Culture matters1920×952 161 KB   Questions 19:42 - Frank Cruz: Outside of Web3 native intelligence, what are your thoughts on decentralizing front and back ends?  Common Abbreviated Terms DAO: Decentralized Autonomous Organinization RWA: Real World Asset DeFi: Decentralized Finance  Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.

Following up on this. Unfortunately, @pvl had some technical issues during the call so we were unable to complete the Q&A session. I have the presentation recorded and we will get that uploaded to Youtube shortly. We will reschedule the Q&A session for a future date - currently TBD.
